title: How do I access the new achievement awards?
body: Been trying to access my rewards online but I have no clue as to how to get them. I get on the website and it just says that I have no summoners account, or something along those lines. Anyway to get the rewards would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
My bet is they're referring to the new level up achievement rewards that garena has. https://lol.garena.com/news/general/newbie-rewards-revamped

That's for garena though so not a thing for NA and other regions.

I think he is referring g to the free champs/skins that are available through riot (Twitter following etc)

https://boosteria.org/guides/league-legends-free-skins-guide-unlock

This should help if so

I'm really not sure what achievement rewards you're referring.  Do you mean [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)?  Let me know, because I'm starting to think you might have fallen victim to a phishing scam.
Youtubers like Brofresco have made video's about rewards that you get if you level your acc.

Not that I'm aware of.  The only think I can think of here is the[ new player chest ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp)when reaching level 5.  This is a small set of hextech content to introduce players to [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).  Let me know if that clears things up!
